subject: Hockey, Ice
Blacks
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: As the N.H.L. tries to promote diversity in the game, the organization has turned to Willie O’Ree, who in 1958 became the N.H.L.’s first black player.
snippet: As the N.H.L. tries to promote diversity in the game, the organization has turned to Willie O’Ree, who in 1958 became the N.H.L.’s first black player.
